channel.title: Help me with my client
channel.description:
Hey i get this error everytime i try to play my server, the client closes after a min or so. And i get this error.
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=4420, t id=5632
And theres more but wont let me copy. Any help me?

item.title: Help me with my client
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

i experienced this error when I tried to edit too many things and I think i messed up some of the } with { in the client.java and other places so I actually had to revert back to my original copy. Sorry if this wasnt much help, but that is what solved it for me =\

Read full topic
